meta.title: VIGOR Memberclient
meta.keywords: vig, vigor, eosdac, member, eos, dac, token, custodian, blockchain, crypto, decentralized, autonomous
meta.noscript: To view this webpage you need to have javascript enabled

index.description_p1: Vigor is a decentralized autonomous community that is building and deploying the open source VIGOR stablecoin platform on the EOS blockchain according to the whitepaper, powered by the VIG token.
index.description_p2: Join us and help build. 1.) Sign the constitution 2.) Ask us on telegram for a free stake token and fill out a profile for the voters 3.) Stake and register as candidate. Every candidate can claim VIG tokens every day. Higher voted candidates claim more VIG. The top 21 voted candidates become custodian and take on decision making responsibilities.

verify_token.copied_to_clipboard: Copied the token to your clipboard!
verify_token.description: You've been redirected to this page to pair an eos account with a discord id. Please sign the message and go back to the discord bot. Run the command $verify.
verify_token.title: Verify token
